content.rendered:
Sunday 9 October 2022
Location: London
Registration fee: £25
Sponsorship target: £350

All our places on Team Hope are now filled. If you would like to run this iconic half marathon next year (2023) please complete the below form to be included on the waiting list and we’ll be in touch. Don’t forget though to enter the ballot too to increase your chances of taking part.

If you have a ballot place and would like to fundraise for us and be part of Team Hope, please let us know by emailing Catherine at fundraising@hopeandhomes.org

Register for the Royal Parks Half Marathon

Secure your place to run with us in the Royal Parks Half Marathon by filling in the form below:
Name(Required)
This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

.

excerpt.rendered: Join Team Hope for this iconic half marathon as it takes you through four of London’s parks, including Hyde Park and Kensington Gardens.
